definitions.definition: One who has been released from something.
A type of French police officer.
One of four officers of the Yeomen of the Royal Guard, having the rank of corporal; an exon.
To grant (someone) freedom or immunity from.
definitions.example: Citizens over 45 years of age were exempted from military service.

definitions.definition: Free from a duty or obligation.
definitions.example: His income is so small that it is exempt from tax.

definitions.definition: (of an employee or his position) Not entitled to overtime pay when working overtime.
